sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from "react"; import "./css/PageView.css"; const Statistics = () => { const { calculatedStats } = useContext(WeatherData); console.log(calculatedStats); return (

Statistics of the day

Please enter a city in the Search bar to see the Daily Statistics

MAX TEMP: ${calculatedStats.temperature.max} C
MAX HUMD: ${calculatedStats.humidity.max} %
AVG TEMP: ${temperature.avg.toFixed(2)} C
AVG HUMD: ${calculatedStats.humidity.avg.toFixed(2)} %
MIN TEMP: ${calculatedStats.temperature.min} C
MIN HUMD: ${calculatedStats.humidity.min} %

Warmest time of the following period: ${calculatedStats.warmestTime}

Coldest time of the following period: ${calculatedStats.coldestTime}

); }; export default Statistics;
